version_description:
・Improved performance.
　-If you have medium quality / low quality, please try with the next higher quality.

・Some problems have been resolved.

▼ Function ▼
・Select the camera mode from "Auto" and "Manual"
It is now possible.

Manual: By flicking the upper half of the screen,
Camera moves
Auto: The camera always moves behind the character

・Implemented ranking.
→ You can now browse the ranking by level ranking
Aim for TOP100! !!

▼ Performance ▼
・nothing special

▼ Others ▼
・nothing special

▼ Function ▼
・Added the last area and last boss
・ Prepared the next island
・ You can now see the world map when you clear the first island.

▼ Performance ▼
・ Temporary measures when a wall is pulled out
(If you break through the wall and invade outside the area, you will return to the initial position.)

・ Measures when an enemy gets on the head
(The physical judgment between the enemy and the player has been eliminated.)

・Fixed bugs related to ranking function
(There is a possibility that the user name registration has failed and a communication error has occurred.
Considering this, if the user name is incorrect, you will be prompted to re-enter it. )

▼ Others ▼
・nothing special

▼ Function ▼
・ Review of movement speed
→ The movement speed has been improved due to the increase in AGI.

▼ Performance ▼
・ Measures against wall omission
→ I don't think it will break through the wall.
　It may get caught in a small object.

・Improved the fact that the area guard is slightly visible.
→ It is completely invisible.

▼ Others ▼
・ A part of the invasion area has been added on the archaeological island.
　(Monsters do not boil)

▼ Function ▼
・10 consecutive gacha implementation
・Added a new sword

▼ Performance ▼
・nothing special

▼ Others ▼
・ Adjusted the difficulty level
　-Enemies extremely above your level (excluding BOSS)
　 I tried not to make it appear.

▼ Function ▼
・nothing special

▼ Performance ▼
・Fixed a bug related to the new sword.

▼ Others ▼
・nothing special
